title: (x) Banner Sea'n'Sky - (similar to) Sonic {Marc O}
content: Looks very crudely drawn to me -- my guess is it's free, though a perusal of the sci-fi fonts on DaFont didn't turn it up.
author: cheshiredave

comments.content:
A commercial font in the same vein:   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/sonic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126220231/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/sonic/)
